Class SymbolTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • SymbolTable

  • public class SymbolTable
extends java.lang.Object
    SymbolTable : A symbol table that keeps a correspondence between symbolic labels and numeric addresses.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SymbolTable()
      Constructor that initializes the hash map that contains the symbols.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSymbol(java.lang.String symbol, int value)
      Adds a symbol and its associated value to the symbol table.
      boolean containsSymbol(java.lang.String symbol)
      Returns the integer associated with the symbol.
      int getSymbol(java.lang.String symbol)
      Returns the integer associated with the symbol.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SymbolTable

        public SymbolTable()
        Constructor that initializes the hash map that contains the symbols. Calls method addPredefinedSymbols() to add default symbols.

    • Method Detail

      • getSymbol

        public int getSymbol(java.lang.String symbol)
        Returns the integer associated with the symbol.
        Parameters:
        symbol - Input string that is the symbol.
        Returns:
        returns the integer related to the string.

      • containsSymbol

        public boolean containsSymbol(java.lang.String symbol)
        Returns the integer associated with the symbol.
        Parameters:
        symbol - Input string that is the symbol.
        Returns:
        returns true if the symbol is in the table.

      • addSymbol

        public void addSymbol(java.lang.String symbol,
                      int value)
        Adds a symbol and its associated value to the symbol table.
        Parameters:
        symbol - Input string that is the symbol.
        value - Input integer that is associated with the symbol
